FuncDef: This command allows the user to configure the expected received payload type value in byte 0 of the Payload structure identifier (PSI) of the OPU overhead. When this values does not match the received value, the OPU-PLM alarm will be reported if it is enabled.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the expected value to the standard value in the payload type field.
Specifies the expected received payload type value in bytes. Values-[00 to FF] Hexadecimal notation. ParamDefault: Default- 00

ExtraInfo: Default: 3 for 10GE-LAN/WAN or OC192 with OTU encapsulation; 5 for GFP framed 10GE-LAN with OTU encapsulation.
